highlights: Lead two full stack teams building a new product at C1 partnering with Product and Design
Building B2B2C functionality for Dealerships and consumers, scaling Showroom to 10x the customers in 2022
work.summary:
In 2022, I returned to lead our Capital One Digital Auto Retailing Platform, Showroom! I started at C1 as an engineer on this team. Very excited to come back and work with the team again!

In January of 2021, I transitioned to leading the Consumer Service and Protection Products team for Capital One Auto Finance. Our team creates dealer facing onboarding experiences to setup their service and protection plans and the consumer facing experience to share these products with consumers they shop for their car.

highlights: Designed and implemented Showroom's user authentication and profile systems
Mentored and developed junior team members
work.summary: Senior engineer helping deliver Capital One's Showroom product for automotive dealers. Showroom is a white label solution that allows dealers to showcase their inventory to consumers. Capital One builds the entire solution from deployment to integration on dealer's websites.

Credera is a true professional, full-service business and technology consulting firm. We work with Fortune 1,000 companies across the country, medium-sized businesses, government organizations and clients across a broad range of industries.

Credera’s specialties include Management Consulting, eCommerce, Mobile Solutions, Custom Development, Microsoft Solutions, Business Intelligence Solutions, and User Experience.

Credera’s Core Values:
• Integrity: Fidelity to moral principles
• Excellence: Great merit or efficiency. Excel: to be superior; to surpass
• Professionalism: Demonstrating a courteous, conscientious, and businesslike manner in the workplace
• Humility: Modesty in self-estimation; humbleness
